alert.note: Alert for Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; North Phoenix, Glendale (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 03 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 145 PM MST... At 100 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cashion, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Avondale, Goodyear, El Mirage, Tolleson, Youngtown, Laveen, Cashion, Sun City, Litchfield Park, Glendale Sports Complex, Luke AFB, North Mountain Park, Arizona State Fairgrounds, Phoenix International Raceway, Downtown Peoria, Downtown Phoenix, Downtown Glendale and Metro Center. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 126 and 149. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 215. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 5. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Buckeye, Avondale; Central Phoenix; North Phoenix, Glendale
